content: A very good storyline by one of the best mystery writers of all time: Agatha Christie. And one of the best detectives Hercule Poirot
Slow but mesmorising

Love this game!!! It follows the story very well. The issue I have had is that the controls don't respond very well at times. The puzzles are fun to solve and my favorite part is when Poirot is using his " Little Gray Cells". I just wish there were more Agatha Christie games like this available!!!!!!!!!
Ironic game brilliant
If you love H.P. then you will also love this game because you will be emrsed into his world. If you want to play this caind of game you will probably be frustrated.
Great
Brilliant game

Poirot's character is (understandably) a bit diverted from that in the books, and the analysis processes are sometimes illogical. However, it is still a very enjoyable game for a fan of Agatha Christie. Please make more games like this.
Average
Very fun and stays pretty true to character!

Really cool. Actually a mystery story and not just walking around finding hidden objects. Based on the book and not at all disappointing to Christie fans. Differnt kind of game. Worth the price. Played for several days
Great story gameplay but few glitches
Crashing on 2nd murder case on Note 10+ otherwise was working perfectly throughout and is an enjoyable game. Would raise this back to five stars if developers fix.
Bon! Very detailed and precise Poirot methodology
Loved solving the puzzles!
Game crashes when beginning the second murder investigation. Applied for a refund and was denied. Will change my review if refunded or if the issue is fixed. Was a decent game up to that point.
Nice
simple but still enjoyable

Such a slog. I'm a big fan of the point & click adventure genre but I did not enjoy this game at all. So much of this game is reading unskippable text or waiting for the scene to slowly fade out or in or for Poirot to gaze at himself in a mirror. You do the same lame letter puzzle 4 times. There are only a handful of real puzzles and some of them have frustrating clunky controls. This is really a game of tapping the screen and waiting more than anything else. I couldn't wait for it to be over.

Pretty fun game. The mechanics are interesting. The graphics are very nice, particularly the way the rendered characters move around. Faces are decent, though a few of the females look alike. The one odd issue with graphics is that some bitmap textures in the game are very low-res and blurry. These are maps or things that you zoom in on, so you can't gloss over them. Good voice acting. There are a few bits that feel like busywork (compare letters again?). I liked the game overall. A bit pricey.
It was a while ago since I played this now, but it's still easily one of the best games I've played on my phone. I really recommend it. I wish there was another...

Glad I didn't go by the negative reviews! I really enjoy playing this game! Could do without the pointing out of clues however. I recommend this game! There are nothing wrong with the controls that I can see.

The story is great and the gameplay is fantastic for Android and an eight dollar game. Although the controls are extremely frustrating. I found myself having a harder time trying to click on something than actually solving the puzzles. Which made movement in the game a great stresser. The controls almost ruin an otherwise really neat little game
This was really fun up until it started crashing so much that it became unplayable about halfway through. Kinda disappointed.  Uninstalling.
I thought it would be brilliant..but I wish I didn't pay for this. the graphics are good, controls are a nightmare and feel it's not entertaining enough.
Great game, if you ignore the clunky controls...
If you like the Agatha Christie PC games, then you will like this.
Enjoyed the adventure
Great story and great fun. Please make more games like this.

A fun little mystery title. If you like mystery games, or puzzle games like the room, you'll probably like this one. Knocked it down one star because of a few repetitive game play moments, and a couple of obtuse "little grey cell" puzzles. Still, highly recommended.
Great game love it xx
The puzzles are a great way of getting you to think. I have learning disabilities and this game is very good for me.
Good but short
Unfortunately, it wouldn't install
The game won't start . Refund please
Nice cell shaded graphics, good gameplay if you like Poirot get this.
I have been waiting for a game like LA Noire for mobile. then this showed up. love it.

I've played the first chapter of the PC version of this game before, but found my hardware struggled to produce smooth gameplay. This version looks & plays excellently on my tablet, with one complaint: the Observation puzzles are rendered pointless due to icons indicating exactly where to tap! All other elements are identical to the PC version, but it would be nice to have the option to turn off the icons indicating where to click all the time as it makes the game less an investigation experience, therefore somewhat dull.
